title: MK Stalin Travels In Bullet Train In Japan, Seeks "Equivalent" Service In India
selftext: Thought this was an old post, but then this is happening right now
comments:
Why can't they learn things like governance, honour, focussing on healthcare, and focus on cleanliness etc from politicians in Japan ?

People forget intrinsic values and rather try to copy superficial things. If India has an environment for making bullet trains, a bullet train will come on its own.

On the other hand, if you try to build a bullet train without a proper environment, it will take 9 years... And still not even bought enough land. LOL
Guy gotta use a different name when traveling abroad. Names of controversial historical figures will cause unnecessary scrutiny abroad.
As a chief minister there is no problem, there is a diplomatic protocol that is followed

I wish people also learnt some time-critical things like how Singapore uses tech to make the city greener and cooler because the climate change problem is at our doorstep. Eg: https://youtu.be/PM101DvvG4Q. We are rapidly urbanizing and unfortunately we are at a scenario where we need to think hard about maintaining a balance between creating concrete jungles vs decongesting urban centers.
Well said, concentrate on basic needs ffs.

You will see the equivalent one if politicians stop corruption n give freebies for votes n focus on governance n infrastructure 

 Japanese  must be like rolling on the floor n laughing looking at his Jimmy Neutron hair style which seem to be painted with the blackest hair color he could find
